short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamless Item Replacement and Pricing Search for the Internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search online retailers for item replacement pricing right from the Encircle web app (https://encircleapp.com). 

By tightly integrating with the Encircle web app (https://encircleapp.com), the Encircle Pricing Chrome extension offers a seamless item replacement pricing workflow.

Once installed, use the GOOGLE or the “Price Using…” buttons from any item photo (or the shopping cart icon from the spreadsheet view), from within the Encircle web application. 

FEATURES:
- Pick from over 30 supported online retailers
- Easily see replacement prices from search results, highlighted with a yellow box. 
- Simply click a price to use it as a replacement price for your item in Encircle.
- The link to the replacement item price will automatically be included for the Encircle item.
- Quickly refine your search or switch retailers with the Encircle searchbar at the top of the retailer screen.
- Use Google Search to find a specific online retailer if necessary. All features work seamlessly for any website.


SUPPORT:
For technical assistance, feedback, or high fives, email to support@encircleapp.com.
